title: The Good, The Bad, and the League: 10/4 - 10/18
body:
_Your semi-weekly dose of server problem-os, NA League news, and other! (Moved to Mondays for easier updates)_

Worlds has some interesting teams moving to knockout stage, TFT set 2 is on PBE and...oh yeah, we had a 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY announcement for League (and a bunch of other games, nbd). 

**Follow-Ups:**

* **Mac voice still not working properly** Bug grouped with other Mac bugs

**Ongoing**

* **Transfer service goes down(9/21 - 10/9)** Player Support notifies the NOC that players are getting errors when attempting to transfer between Europe and Oceania (Not 100% failure rate, but not 0% either). This has been fixed as of 10/9! 

* **TFT Match History intermittent(9/26 - 10/9)** TFT match history goes live on all regions, and reports start to filter in over the next day that TFT matches aren’t always showing up in match history. This has been fixed as of 10/9! 

**Server Stuff: **

* **RP fulfillment issues causing players to not get RP(10/4, ~7 hours)** An alert pops stating a few players redeemed codes, but didn’t get RP. Investigation by payments team found a rounding error with decimals (pesky little things it seems). Players get their RP and the code causing the error is fixed server side. 

* **NA is unavailable due to extended HW maintenance(10/7, ~54 minutes)** NA is unavailable for longer than planned from a hardware maintenance. Final QA takes longer than expected, which caused the platform to open for players later than our original plans. 

* **Players are unable to checkout with PayOn(10/7, ~2 hours)** Automated alerting notices that PayOn processing is having problems. Payments team uncover that the problem isn’t on Riot’s side. PayOn processing is disabled until PayOn resolves their issue, which they do quickly after being notified. 

* **Misconfig leads to players unable to login(10/8, ~4 hours)** Player Support notifies the NOC that there’s a spike of players unable to login. NOC investigates login queue and discovers part of the system is having problems. Network engineers divert traffic away from an affected node, which enables players to log in again. Once the login queue is gone, engineers begin to fix the affected node and then transitions traffic back onto it again. 

* **Honor goes down(10/8, ~93 minutes)** Automated alerts notices that Honor rewards are down to 0. Investigation shows a changelist step was done out of order (pushed early) causing the problem. A correct config is pushed out, resuming rewards correctly. 

* **Free to play champion rotation not updated(10/15, ~104 minutes)** Automated alerts notify the NOC that champion rotation isn’t pushed properly. NOC manually sets config changes to enable free to play champions for this patch, and gets the automated config updated to work properly with the next patch.

**Game Stuff: **

* **Games in progress killed by accident(10/7, ~4 hours)** The NOC notices various views aren’t updating with data, and rioter reports filter in that players are stuck attempting to reconnect in a TFT match. Investigation leads to a series of config updates taking place, which also incorrectly targeted NA servers instead of PBE servers. The config updates are paused, and all affected players have to endure a ghost game until they can queue up again. 

* **TFT traits not displaying or triggering in-game(10/9, ~34 hours)** Player reports filter in that players aren’t getting TFT synergies with proper numbers of units. TFT team identifies that preemptive code changes shipped for future patches caused the issue, and a fix rolls out via a micropatch once being approved by QA. 

_Morgageddon_

replies.body:
For the love of God fix this Mac bug. It's been more than one year (June 2018) since I stopped using League Voice... itì's franky embarassing and pathetic that an officially supported client has such a bug for so long...


Edit: I have to correct myself, it's been roughly one year (October 2018) since the appearance of the bug.

> [{quoted}](name=Gio Sad Honey,realm=EUW,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=hrKfcMuw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-23T18:56:16.769+0000)
>
> For the love of God fix this Mac bug. It's been more than one year (June 2018) since I stopped using League Voice... itì's franky embarassing and pathetic that an officially supported client has such a bug for so long...
> 
> 
> Edit: I have to correct myself, it's been roughly one year (October 2018) since the appearance of the bug.

You can use this workaround:

1. close the LoL app
2. open Terminal.app
3. run this line: cd /Applications/League\ of\ Legends.app/Contents/LoL/
4. then this one: LeagueClient.app/Contents/MacOS/LeagueClient

In this way you, launching the LoL.app from the Terminal.app, it will ask the OS to use the microphone. 

p.s. the first line has to be modify if the LoL.app is not located in the Application Folder

That’s actually really useful! Is it required to choose the directory though? If I’m not mistaken you could instead run the line:
__/Applications/League\ of\ Legends.app/Contents/LoL/LeagueClient.app/Contents/MacOS/LeagueClient__
since the system home folder is already the default directory.

> [{quoted}](name=EATARI,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=hrKfcMuw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-25T20:56:14.576+0000)
>
> That’s actually really useful! Is it required to choose the directory though? If I’m not mistaken you could instead run the line:
> __/Applications/League\ of\ Legends.app/Contents/LoL/LeagueClient.app/Contents/MacOS/LeagueClient__
> since the system home folder is already the default directory.

Mmmmh maybe you are right! I have to try this solution as well
Sometimes when i go into a game i get stuck in the loading screen and i cant get out no even Alt+f4 works so i have to reset my computer and j get leave buster for being afk to me that is dog shit

Maybe Borderless instead of Fullscreen will help you get out in that case?
(had fullscreen bugging for me a while back, even being on top of task manager started from ctrl-alt-del menu, so couldn't kill LoL from task manager, so had to indeed shut down or start the shutdown and interrupt it after the shutdown killed LoL but before it completed.     Borderless should prevent LoL from being such a blocking top window.)
It's happened to me twice now in the last few days...I've submitted bug reports but it doesn't bring my LP back~ :cries:

So what's with season 10 changes only sometimes being on the pbe? They were on, now they aren't. I've seen people playing games with the season 10 changes, but whenever I try to play on pbe it's still on season 9?
What's PS?

my favorite part of playing your game is when I leave in the middle of it because of the n word being spammed in 29 out of 30 of my games
Well this is clearly false.
still haven't been banned lets go !
Ouch

hey morg ive written in a few times on a few issues. First off if i could have you or someone that knows what is happening help me in any way that would be great. The problem im having is one thats gone on for months. That being, nearly every game i play my game crashes or freezes at 1;30. I have to sign out and come back in. You can understand that you basically lose the game if you start 3 levels behind. And i do. Sometimes i am dced for long enough that the game goes into remake. I buy items, i go to lane, but as soon as my game freezes it remakes. Not only is this a gameplay problem but its gamebreaking. That being i dont get to play if it happens. Please fix this or help me fix this issue. I know its plagued multiple people as well. This kinda ties into issue two. Even though this happened last year as well before my game starting this freezing issue. This one being that i am permanently stuck at honor 3 checkpoint ONE. I honor regularly after games and get honored regularly as well. The reason why this ties in is that I am assuming that me being the remakee is making me go to the system as a "leaver" which i am not. This could be the issue im having with gaining other honor. I also know that last year people were reporting the same thing with honor not going up no matter what. This sucks very much for me since i get to be skipped due to a system error. Please make let me know how to "honor UP" I havent had to restart because of chat restrictions or anything either. Full year of playing. Honor 3 checkpoint 1 for nearly the whole season. Ranked up to honor 3 as fast as normal players. Stoppped and havent moved in literal months. Now Honestly both issues suck a lot for me. But the former is the one that is not allowing me to play at all. PLEASE im begging for your help to fix this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=inuitmailman,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=hrKfcMuw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-27T08:39:15.301+0000)

But the former is the one that is not allowing me to play at all. PLEASE im begging for your help to fix this issue.

I looked and couldn't find any player support tickets from you about this issue. You 100% need to write in to Player Support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us ) use the tech issue area, and write in about it. You'll probably need to create logs via the Hextech toolkit, such as a process list and a dxdiag. Most likely you have out of date drivers, a conflicting software program running, or need to completely uninstall/re-install LoL fresh to see if it's helpful.

The guys and gals there will help you fix the issue, but you're going to have to listen and apply the steps they give.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Morgageddon,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=hrKfcMuw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-10-28T21:07:58.314+0000)
>
> I looked and couldn't find any player support tickets from you about this issue. You 100% need to write in to Player Support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) use the tech issue area, and write in about it. You'll probably need to create logs via the Hextech toolkit, such as a process list and a dxdiag. Most likely you have out of date drivers, a conflicting software program running, or need to completely uninstall/re-install LoL fresh to see if it's helpful.
> 
> The guys and gals there will help you fix the issue, but you're going to have to listen and apply the steps they give.

telling me that this page is no longer able to be reached. Do you have a new link to this magical place? Thank you for your help.

> [{quoted}](name=inuitmailman,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=hrKfcMuw,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-11-01T04:38:09.729+0000)
>
> telling me that this page is no longer able to be reached. Do you have a new link to this magical place? Thank you for your help.

The link threw in an extra parenthesis for no reason, DaenrysTargaryen below linked it, and I edited my post above to fix it.

Always a good habit of putting spaces around links in parentheses; multiple forum/board software seem to have the habit of incoporating the parenthesis into the link. :(     (I guess technically a parenthesis can be part of an URL, but maybe forum/boards software should drop support for that super, super, super rare case to prevent the much more frequent case of incoporating a parenthesis into the link when it shouldn't...   Heck, they don't do it for a space at the end, even though that's more frequent (%20) in an URL.)
why? U Riot me

Hey Morg, ik you guys likely have something planned for Shyvana after the Volibear and Fiddlesticks rework. But I feel like this PBE has nerfed her fairly hard. Especially her passive where it's now a max of 25 Armor and Magic resist instead of 35 like it used to be. With that said I do have an idea how to at least change her passive and was wondering if you would be willing to hear my idea?
